member.name: T:ifc.ifc_bl
member.summary: Provide access to IFC-BL02.

member.name: F:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_encon
member.summary: To enable stand alone encoding process for BL1.

member.name: F:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_encon
member.summary: To enable stand alone encoding process for BL2.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.#ctor(ifc.ifc_ci,System.Byte)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_bl class using the specified ifc.ifc_ci and address for IFC-BL02.
member.param: ifc.ifc_ci in use.
Address for IFC-BL02, in range of 0 to 63. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.#ctor(ifc.ifc_ci,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_bl class using the specified ifc.ifc_ci and address for IFC-BL02.
member.param: ifc.ifc_ci in use.
Address for IFC-BL02, in range of 0 to 63. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_cw
member.summary: To change the BL1 direction to clockwise.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_cw
member.summary: To change the BL2 direction to clockwise.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_ccw
member.summary: To change the BL1 direction to counter-clockwise.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_ccw
member.summary: To change the BL2 direction to counter-clockwise.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_speed(System.Byte)
member.summary: To change the speed of BL1.
member.param: Speed value of BL1 in range of 0 to 255. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_speed(System.Int32)
member.summary: To change the speed of BL1.
member.param: Speed value of BL1 in range of 0 to 255. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_speed(System.Byte)
member.summary: To change the speed of BL2.
member.param: Speed value of BL2 in range of 0 to 255. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_speed(System.Int32)
member.summary: To change the speed of BL2.
member.param: Speed value of BL2 in range of 0 to 255. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_stop
member.summary: To stop BL1.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_stop
member.summary: To stop BL2.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_brake
member.summary: To brake BL1.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_brake
member.summary: To brake BL2.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_enclr
member.summary: To clear BL1 encoder value.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_enclr
member.summary: To clear BL2 encoder value.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_enval
member.summary: To read BL1 encoder value.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_enval
member.summary: To read BL2 encoder value.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_runstat
member.summary: To read BL1 run status.
member.returns: Return false if BL1 is stopped or braked. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_runstat
member.summary: To read BL2 run status.
member.returns: Return false if BL2 is stopped or braked. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_enstat
member.summary: To read BL1 stand alone encoding status.
member.returns: Return true if BL1 encoder is in progress. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_enstat
member.summary: To read BL2 stand alone encoding status.
member.returns: Return true if BL2 encoder is in progress. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_1_spval
member.summary: To read BL1 speed value.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl.bl_2_spval
member.summary: To read BL2 speed value.

member.name: T:ifc.ifc_bl._bl_1_encon
member.summary: For IFC system internal use.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl._bl_1_encon.#ctor(ifc.ifc_ci,System.Byte)
member.summary: For IFC system internal use.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl._bl_1_encon.none(System.Int32)
member.summary: No action after targeted encoder value is reached.
member.param: Targeted encoder value in range of 0 to 65535. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl._bl_1_encon.bl1_stop(System.Int32)
member.summary: BL1 stop after targeted encoder value is reached.
member.param: Targeted encoder value in range of 0 to 65535. (int)

member.summary: BL1 brake after targeted encoder value is reached.

member.summary: BL1 change direction to clockwise after targeted encoder value is reached.
member.param: Targeted encoder value in range of 0 to 65535. (int)
BL1 speed after targeted encoder value is reached. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bl._bl_1_encon.bl1_ccw(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: BL1 change direction to counter-clockwise after targeted encoder value is reached.

BL1 speed after targeted encoder value is reached. (int)

member.summary: BL1 change speed after targeted encoder value is reached.
member.param: Targeted encoder value in range of 0 to 65535. (int)
BL1 speed after targeted encoder value is reached. (int)

member.summary: BL1 and BL2 stop after targeted encoder value is reached.
